Name.label: Disorder of amino acid absorption and transport

TextSection.Contents: Hyperdibasic aminoaciduria, type 1 is characterised by increased renal clearance of lysine, ornithine and arginine, in the presence of normal concentrations of cystine. Heterozygous individuals are asymptomatic but homozygotes display intellectual deficit. To date, 25 heterozygotes and one homozygote have been reported.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
